alert.note: Alert for Calvert (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued March 12 at 10:46PM EDT until March 13 at 11:00AM EDT by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM TO 11 AM EDT MONDAY... * WHAT...Up to one half foot of inundation above ground level expected in low lying areas due to tidal flooding. * WHERE...Shoreline in Calvert County. * WHEN...From 3 AM to 11 AM EDT Monday, especially around the time of high tide. * IMPACTS...At 3.0 feet, water is expected to reach backyards near 9th Street in North Beach, and could approach 9th Street. At 3.0 feet, parking lots near Charles Street in Solomons begin to flood, with several inches of water covering low- lying portions of Charles Street and Williams Street. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Tides one and a half to two feet above normal. High tide Monday morning at Chesapeake Beach is at 8:50 AM. High tide Monday morning at Solomons Island is at 6:45 AM. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property. && Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. Chesapeake Bay at North Beach MLLW Categories - Minor 3.0 ft, Moderate 4.0 ft, Major 5.0 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 1.6 ft, Moderate 2.6 ft, Major 3.6 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 13/09 AM 3.1 1.7 1.9 0.5 Minor 13/07 PM 2.3 0.9 1.8 0.5 None 14/09 AM 2.1 0.7 0.9 0.5 None 14/08 PM 0.7 -0.7 0.2 0.5 None 15/10 AM -0.2 -1.6 -1.4 0.5 None Patuxent River at Solomons Island MLLW Categories - Minor 3.0 ft, Moderate 4.0 ft, Major 5.0 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 1.5 ft, Moderate 2.5 ft, Major 3.5 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 13/06 AM 3.2 1.7 1.9 1.0 Minor 13/06 PM 2.7 1.2 1.8 1.0 None 14/06 AM 2.1 0.6 1.0 1.0 None 14/07 PM 1.0 -0.5 0.1 2.0 None 15/09 AM 0.1 -1.4 -1.2 2.0 None &&
